original_definition: 'automatic tumble drier' means a tumble drier which switches off the drying process when a certain moisture content of the load is detected, for example through conductivity or temperature sensing;
generated_definition: 'automatic tumble drier' means a device used to dry clothes automatically by tumbling them in a rotating drum with heat and/or steam.

Article 2: ‘automatic tumble drier’ means a tumble drier which switches off the drying process when a certain moisture content of the load is detected, for example through conductivity or temperature sensing;
Article 10: whether the household tumble drier is an ‘automatic tumble drier’ or ‘non-automatic tumble drier’;
